messages.subject: Christmas in Mibu (CONTEST) & Rare Fic in Japanese
messages.msgSnippet: PMK Nagakura wearing elf hat The holidays are here!  So if anyone would like a polaroid or digital pic of their screaming infant with no bladder control with
messages.messageBody:
PMK Nagakura wearing elf hat
"The holidays are here! So if anyone would like a polaroid or digital
pic of their screaming infant with no bladder control with Kondou
wearing a fake beard---I mean Santy Claus over there please get in
line..."

Kondou "Ho ho ho Merry Christmas---ok we need to come up with better
fundraisers, I'm starting to smell like diapers, how about kidnapping
Teruhime, gagging her annoying assistant and having Matsudaira
Katamori take his time in paying the ransom..."

PMK Nagakura yells to SEC "Why DO I HAVE TO BE THE Elf? Just because
I have orange-red hair---"

SEC "You have got to be the most vertically challenged swordsman in
all of Kyoto. Please continued with the promo."

PMK Nagakura ::sigh:: "Ok people get over to
http://www.shinsengumifics.com/contest2005.htm and write like crazy to
win REAL PRIZES!!!! One of which is http://www.hajimenokizu.com 's
entire collection of Saitou X (insert anyone) yaoi doujinshi"

SEC "Wait! Kizu is going to give away her yaoi doujinshi? SErious?"

Hajimenokizu "NO!!!! Please carefully read the rules to the contest
before making RIDICULOUS assumptions. Contact Shinsengumifics if you
have any questions as well"

SEC "Darn, I so wanted those SAitou X Hiko ones..."
----------------------------------------------------
VERY RARE FIC
I know most of us can't read Japanese but I just wanted to post this
sample anyways. The new fanfic genre... ShinsenAizu fics which blends
the emerging appreciation for Aizu historical figures with the
Shinsengumi who were fighting in the domain in 1868

Yamaguchi Jiro (SAitou) & HIjikata & Takagi Morinosuke & Takagi Tokio
& DIARY at Sawamoto Waterfalls

Prologue
http://fuyuzuki2.hp.infoseek.co.jp/sousaku/boji.html
Actual story it seems
http://fuyuzuki2.hp.infoseek.co.jp/sousaku/bojio.html

I cannot fully understand it with http://www.nifty.com/globalgate
but I found it while searching for Takagi Morinosuke---I should be
finding fanart on him any day now

many people visit his grave in Aizu and all...also several historical
figures who are all deeply connected to the Fujita family during the
Meiji have fansites with MUCHO hits---strange how manga writers
haven't combined Shinsengumi, Joushitai, Byakkotai together
somehow...it really is a no brainer
